lines: 1. Ekina giachakirwe Igoro,Naki ntwe torateneneo;Anache Nyasa' Omogambi,Ker'ogokora n'enchera.
Naki ntwe torantenene,Rituko riria rinene;'Go toratoke twaremeirwe,Gos'ebibe biatinyigwe?
2. Abakure banacheirw' ekina,Erio nyuma abare moyo;Bonsi nabanyorerw' ekina,'Kina getari mabera.
3. Naki torabe ase ekin' ekio,Ebibe bikoorokigwa;Kogiaikire konachwa,Kina getari goochoka.
